content: this text is about a legal case involving a divorce and the division of joint assets the parties involved are not mentioned the claimant submitted a petition to the court requesting a divorce and the division of assets the claimant wants certain properties to be registered as their sole property while the defendant should keep another property the claimant also wants to keep a specific car in another legal case the defendant is the sole owner of a passenger car while the claimant is the sole owner of a part company the defendant has responded to the claim in 2023 there was a court session where the parties agreed to the divorce and the division of assets including the sale of their cars the court found the claim admissible and dissolved the marriage the court confirmed the agreement on the division of assets and addressed the distribution of procedural costs
